product_name: Switch Stormrider Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The innovative and versatile Switch Stormrider Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses feature unique magnetic "eye cups" that help your sunglasses function like multi-sport goggles. Includes 1 pair of polarized sunglass lenses that reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Glasses also come with 2 sets of easily interchangeable magnetic eyecups: Activity Guard and Climate Guard. Activity Guard eyecups screen out mild debris and wind, have soft foam cushioning for comfort, and allow airflow with integrated venting. Climate Guard eyecups provide a goggles-like fit with their thin, ultra-flexible thermoplastic rubber rims for maximum blockage of debris, wind, water and other elements. Durable frame with soft rubber nose pads is perfectly designed to fit comfortably beneath a skiing or climbing helmet. When you're done with your performance sports, revert to using just the sunglasses without either set of eyecups. Narrower, rectangular frames works for both men and women. Head-hugging, flexible temples; adjustable strap included. Switch Stormrider Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses come with a hard case and 1 eyecup pouch.
